paragraphs: You must be more selective in your recruitment. As our presence in Senchal grows, more and more seek to join us to find refuge from the coming storm. We have no need for weak, unskilled rabble. You must now seek warriors.
The underground arena in the Black Kiergo should suit our needs nicely. Select only the finest warriors and invite them to our fortress. Do not disappoint me.

May the New Moon Soon Rise Above Us All,
Ra'khajin
